permissions: User can create if they are a manager/admin of the organization or they are the given-by user.
side_effects: Creates a public praise and enqueues a Slack notification; received-by is added to recipients.
validation_notes: --description, --given-by, --received-by, --organization-type, and --organization-id are required. --recipient-ids and --culture-value-ids expect comma-separated lists of IDs. Organization type must be one of Broker, Customer, Trucker. The given-by user must practically have a membership with the organization. The broker must match the organization.

flags.name: --given-by
flags.description: User ID who is giving the praise (required)
flags.validation: Must practically have a membership with the organization

flags.name: --received-by
flags.description: User ID who is receiving the praise (required)

flags.name: --recipient-ids
flags.description: Comma-separated list of additional recipient user IDs

flags.name: --culture-value-ids
flags.description: Comma-separated list of culture value IDs
